successes.title: Omni: Move Naturally in Your Favorite Game
successes.description: The Omni enables you to move naturally and freely in virtual worlds. Get fully immersed in your favorite game!

Pledges.description: SPECIAL THANKS: Thank you for your support and for helping us make VR happen. You will receive our digital posters and wall papers, regular updates on our progress, and invitations to our upcoming live events.

OMNI T-SHIRT:  Be the first to get your limited edition Omni T-shirt, only available via Kickstarter. You'll get our digital posters and wall papers, invitations to our upcoming live events, and a sincere thank you from our team.

OMNI T-SHIRT PLUS SIGNED POSTER SET: Receive all rewards above plus our set of three Omni posters (12"x18"). We'll even sign them if you want us to. You'll have our sincere gratitude, and proof of your early adopter support.

MINI OMNI PLUS T-SHIRT PLUS SIGNED POSTER SET: Get all rewards above and the Omni... in mini format (5"x4")!  Put the Omni on your desk or make it a gift.  Throw pens or paper clips in the Omni... or an action figure.

DIY OMNI EARLY BIRD: First 50 backers only.  Get the Omni base and shoes, and build the upper support structure yourself.  We will provide you with drawings and guidance, you do the rest. Show us your creativity and let us know how to improve our design. Disclaimer: not for the faint of heart. The Omni needs an upper support structure to function well, so don't think you can get away without building one! Tracking hardware and software included.
(add $49 per additional pair of shoes)
(shipping costs separate; see FAQ)

DIY OMNI: Get the Omni base and shoes, and build the upper support structure yourself. We will provide you with drawings and guidance, you do the rest. Show us your creativity and let us know how to improve our design. Disclaimer: not for the faint of heart. The Omni needs an upper support structure to function well, so don't think you can get away without building one! Tracking hardware and software included.
(add $49 per additional pair of shoes)
(shipping costs separate; see FAQ)

OMNI EARLY BIRD: Special price for the first 150 backers. Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software. Get ready to move naturally in VR and enter a new world. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI READY PLAYER ONE: Receive a copy of Ready Player One signed by Ernest Cline! Take a peak into the future.  And get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software. Get ready to move naturally in VR and enter a new world. Add $20 for international shipping of the book. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Omni shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI EARLY ENTHUSIAST: Special package for our early backers. Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software, AND receive the exclusive Omni T-shirt, signed Omni artwork poster set, and mini Omni. Get ready to move naturally in VR and enter a new world. Add $30 for international shipping of T-shirt/posters/mini Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Omni shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI NATURAL MOTION INTERFACE: Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software. Get ready to move naturally in VR and enter a new world. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI NATURAL MOTION INTERFACE: Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software. Get ready to move naturally in VR and enter a new world. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI PLUS T-SHIRT / SIGNED POSTER SET / MINI OMNI: Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software, plus our exclusive t-shirt, signed poster set and mini Omni. Add $30 for international shipping of T-shirt/posters/mini Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 for the Omni Rack, see project description. Omni shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI + OMNI RACK: Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software, plus the Omni Rack (see project description).  (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI + OMNI RACK: Get the full Omni natural motion interface, including platform, shoes, belt, and tracking hardware and software, plus the Omni Rack (see project description). (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI ALL-IN: Get the Omni plus Omni Rack, and add our exclusive T-shirt, signed poster set and mini Omni. Add $30 for international shipping of T-shirt/posters/mini Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt. Omni shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

DUEL OMNI: Get two Omnis and settle the score in VR. Designed to allow you and a friend to go head to head or team up. Includes two Omni platforms, three pairs of shoes, two belts, and tracking hardware and software. Note: two PCs required. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes, $79 per additional belt, $79 per Omni Rack, see project description. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

CUSTOM OMNI: Get the Omni All-In, prioritized for early shipment, with three pairs of shoes and two belts, customized for your taste or brand.  Choose your color scheme, and we'll even print your name or logo on the base. You will also receive the digital 3D renderings of your customized Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping costs separate, see FAQ)

OMNI GAMING MATRIX: Get a gaming matrix consisting of 4 interconnected full-option Omnis with Omni Rack for multi-player virtual reality, customized with painted decals for your taste or brand. Includes tracking hardware and software, 12 pairs of shoes, 8 belts, and the digital 3D renderings of your customized or branded Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping and handling costs separate, see FAQ)

HIGH PRIORITY CUSTOM OMNI: Get a custom made Omni made of wood and steel, and get it fast. Finished in natural mahogany or custom painted per your personal design or corporate identity. This reward is designed for first movers in virtual reality. The custom made Omnis start shipping in September 2013, 4 months before the first units of the mass produced version. Includes tracking hardware and software, 3 pairs of shoes, 2 belts, and the digital 3D renderings of your customized or branded Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping and handling costs separate, see FAQ)

IMMEDIATE PROTOTYPE OMNI: Get the original Kickstarter prototype, as seen in the Kickstarter video. You will also get it fast: we can ship in August.  We'll send you a final injection molded version too, when ready (with Omni Rack and customized). And invite you for an office visit and dinner with the team. Includes tracking hardware and software, 3 pairs of shoes, 2 belts, and the digital 3D renderings of your customized Omni. (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping and handling costs separate, see FAQ)

ORIGINAL PROTOTYPE OF THE VIRTUIX OMNI: Get the original Omni prototype as seen in the early videos (the light blue version), a true museum piece. We can ship the day that the Kickstarter closes, so that you will be the first with an Omni ready for use. We'll send you a final injection molded version too, when ready (with Omni Rack and customized). And invite you for an office visit and dinner with the team. Includes tracking hardware and software, 3 pairs of shoes, 2 belts, and the digital 3D renderings of your customized Omni.  (Add $49 per additional pair of shoes and $79 per additional belt. Shipping and handling costs separate, see FAQ)

VR CHAMPION: Thank you - you make VR possible! No Omni in the world can be enough to thank you, so we will give you two: the first made custom wooden/steel Omni, in a design of your choosing, and the first made custom injection molded Omni, in colors and branding of your choosing. These units will be signed and serial numbered starting at 00001. Full option and all-in, including an office visit and dinner with the team - it would be our honor! Includes tracking hardware and software, up to 10 pairs of shoes, and up to 5 belts. (Let us know if you need more? Shipping and handling costs separate, see FAQ)
